title: Ivan_Blocksscan
author: Ivan_Blocksscan
content: Let’s dive into the BlocksScan’s Exciting New Features Added to the XDC Explorer in Q2 of 2022.BlocksScan is the first blockchain explorer that incorporates many different blockchains into one search engine. Now, we strive to make blockchain data understandable and accessible for a wide and varied audience interested in both blockchain and crypto while maintaining and securing the privacy of our users as paramount when developing products.Let’s take a look at the Latest Updations: https://www.xdc.dev/blocksscan/list-of-upgrades-on-blocksscan-explorer-in-this-q2-as-per-communitys-request-h36
